name: Rookie Raccoon
description:
My first entro to LD 41. Coulnd't finish all of what I had in mind but at least got a game going.  The genres are: Shoot'em up and Stealth.

With exception of reused code libraries and @Castpixel's RobotY font, everything was made from scratch.

Controls: Left and Right arrows to move, and Z to shoot.

Enjoy!
